ksi_base_frr_ksi_01.name: Application of Key Security Indicators
ksi_base_frr_ksi_01.description: FedRAMP KSI > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate
ksi_base_frr_ksi_01.instructions: Cloud service providers SHOULD apply ALL Key Security Indicators to ALL aspects of their _cloud service offering_ that are within the FedRAMP Minimum Assessment Scope.

ksi_base_frr_ksi_02.name: Implementation Summaries
ksi_base_frr_ksi_02.description: FedRAMP KSI > Base. Impact Levels: Low, Moderate
ksi_base_frr_ksi_02.instructions: Providers MUST maintain simple high-level summaries of at least the following for each Key Security Indicator:
